page.title: 08HEALTH-A DISTRICT NURSE
page.content: {Nurse Holland}had to get{5 {0,levels}before she trained to be a {State-Registered Nurse}at{The Queen {Elizabeth School Of Nursing}in {Birmingham. She has been a District Nurse for 2.5 years. Every week{Nurse Holland}works 2 or 3 evenings,ie.{10 to 12 hours}a week. She sees up to 7 patients during every shift.Her main job is the care of dying patients,but she also does Post {Hospital Care,}eg, taking stitches out,renewing dressings,strokes,caring for accident victims and giving diabetes injections etc. In this area there are three full time nurses and three part-time evening nurses. Most of her patients are old and the youngest is{65 years old.
